name: Zhihao Yao 0001
content: Zhihao "Zephyr" Yao I joined the Computer Science Department at NJIT in September 2023. I received my B.S. cum laude, M.S. and Ph.D. from UC Irvine. My group (Redoubt Lab) builds practical solutions to real-world challenges in mobile and cloud computing. Our research spans the areas of operating systems, mobile computing, security and privacy. Specifically, we study the security and privacy implications of emerging technologies such as mobile apps, I/O devices, Artificial Intelligence, and Internet of Things.
